name: Michael Mohr
description: Michael Mohr is an internet pioneer in Germany with more than 30 years of experience since the beginning of the internet. He is the CEO of Plugilo and DCI AG, focusing on developing innovative digital solutions for the global e-commerce market.
vision: To develop plugilo into a global B2B network with similar size and market relevance as Facebook or LinkedIn, targeting 80% of the world's e-commerce market.
recentDevelopments: Secured <link type='management' id='michael-urban'>Michael Urban</link> as key investor and new shareholder
Expansion into US market with appointment of Erik Sewell
Capital increase by DCI AG for further development
Development of innovative card and stack format for product information
